name: Enhanced
contents: • NY Enhanced with Full Federal — Comprehensive New York primary law paired with full federal coverage, including statutes, case law, regulations, court rules, and legislative materials. Provides advanced annotations, Shepard’s® citators, and deep research functionality across both NY and federal jurisdictions.

• NY Jury Instructions — Official and model New York jury instructions with commentary, variations, use notes, and pattern language. Helps litigators craft precise, court-ready jury instructions aligned with NY standards.

• NY Briefs, Pleadings, and Motions — A large database of New York litigation documents, including filed briefs, motions, pleadings, and supporting papers. Ideal for strategy development, motion drafting, and understanding how top litigators frame arguments.

• NY Practice Library — Authoritative New York treatises and practice guides across civil, criminal, business, real estate, and procedural areas. Includes expert analysis, checklists, forms, and step-by-step practice guidance specific to NY courts.

• All Forms — A comprehensive library of federal, state, and practice-specific forms across New York and nationwide. Includes editable templates, procedural forms, transactional forms, and litigation drafting tools.

• Practical Guidance — Expert-written guidance across more than 20 practice areas, offering step-by-step instructions, drafting notes, checklists, practice tips, and model documents designed to speed up daily legal work.
• NY Automated Templates — Automated document-assembly templates for New York practitioners, enabling quick creation of court filings, letters, and transactional documents through guided workflows.

• NY Verdicts and Settlements — Detailed summaries of New York jury verdicts, settlements, damages data, and litigation outcomes. Useful for valuation, risk assessment, and building negotiation strategies.
